product_name: Sof Sole Sneaker Balls Deodorizers - Package of 2
long_description: These small, easy-to-use deodorizers tackle tough smells in hard-to-reach places--perfect for shoes, gym bags and lockers. They power through tough odors and leave behind a fresh, clean scent.
short_description: These small, easy-to-use deodorizers tackle tough smells in hard-to-reach places--perfect for shoes, gym bags and lockers. They power through tough odors and leave behind a fresh, clean scent.
